recipe.title: Pineapple Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle dry white wine, such as Chardonnay or Sauvignon Blanc
1 cup brandy (pear brandy is nice but not required)
instructions: In a pitcher, combine the juice, wine, brandy, pineapple, and soda with ice and stir. Pour into large wineglasses and garnish with the mint and orange.
